Enum Class HtmlTag.FormattingHint

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<HtmlTag.FormattingHint>
com.dua3.utility.text.HtmlTag.FormattingHint
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<HtmlTag.FormattingHint>, Constable
Enclosing interface:
HtmlTag
public static enum HtmlTag.FormattingHint extends Enum<HtmlTag.FormattingHint>
Represents formatting hints for handling line breaks around tags. This enum provides predefined combinations of whether line breaks should appear before or after a specific tag in the context of text processing or rendering.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class Enum

    Enum.EnumDesc<E>

  • Enum Constant Summary

    Enum Constants
    Enum Constant
    Description
    LINE_BREAK_AFTER_TAG
    Formatting hint indicating that a line break should be applied after the associated tag.
    LINE_BREAK_BEFORE_AND_AFTER_TAG
    Formatting hint indicating that a line break should be applied both before and after the associated tag.
    LINE_BREAK_BEFORE_TAG
    Formatting hint indicating that a line break should be applied before the associated tag.
    NO_LINE_BREAK
    Formatting hint indicating that no line breaks should be applied neither before nor after the associated tag.

    • linebreakBeforeTag

      public boolean linebreakBeforeTag()
      Checks if a line break should appear before the tag based on the current formatting hint configuration.
      Returns:
      true if a line break is configured to appear before the tag, false otherwise

    • linebreakAfterTag

      public boolean linebreakAfterTag()
      Checks if a line break should appear after a tag based on the current formatting hint configuration.
      Returns:
      true if a line break is configured to appear after the tag, false otherwise

    • from

      public static HtmlTag.FormattingHint from(boolean linebreakBeforeTag, boolean linebreakAfterTag)
      Returns the appropriate FormattingHint value based on the provided boolean flags indicating line break preferences.
      Parameters:
      linebreakBeforeTag - a boolean flag indicating if a line break should appear before the tag
      linebreakAfterTag - a boolean flag indicating if a line break should appear after the tag
      Returns:
      the corresponding FormattingHint value that matches the given line break configuration
